html.body:
Dear Webdesk Administrator!
This is an automatic mail from the webdesk ewp system. Do not reply! It was generated because a webdesk user or a webdesk job tried to create objects (f.i. employees or users), which would violate your currently purchased licence.
Your current licence status:
Licence holder: ${company}, ${companyDesc}
Licence Description Currently in Use Licenced Max
#foreach( $licInfo in $licenceInfos )
$licInfo.name $languageService.translate( $licInfo.description ) #set( $maxInUse = $licInfo.maxInUse - 1) $maxInUse $licInfo.amount
#end
Please contact your local sales representative or directly Workflow EDV GmbH at +43 1 7188842 0
Yours sincerly, The webdesk system
